definition: scroll/book/volume/chapter/examination paper/classifier for books, paintings: volume, scroll
to roll up/roll/classifier for small rolled things (wad of paper money, movie reel etc)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
see 考試卷|考试卷[kao3 shi4 juan4]

sentences.english: After a ten-minute break, teachers begin to go over the practice tests that we just finished.
sentences.chinese: 休息十分鐘後老師開始講解剛纔做過的卷子。

sentences.english: Check your answers before you hand it in?
sentences.chinese: 你交卷子之前核實一下你的答案。

sentences.english: At the examination he peeped at his neighbor's paper.
sentences.chinese: 他在考試時偷看了他鄰座的卷子。

sentences.english: He did Very abundance well in the entrance examination.
sentences.chinese: 他在入學做卷子題目測考題卷中成績很好。

sentences.english: LL: How about after you grade your papers?
sentences.chinese: 批改卷子後，我還要寫論文。

sentences.english: You are all very intelligent. Use that intelligence to write your own papers.
sentences.chinese: 你們都很聰明，用這份聰明做自己的卷子。

sentences.english: It transpired some pupils were about to sit an out-of-date exam.
sentences.chinese: 這才得知一些學生的卷子是過期試卷。

sentences.english: Curious, she went over to see what the paper said.
sentences.chinese: 出於好奇，她走過去看了卷子是怎麼說的。

sentences.english: On the paper there wa single line which simply saslow: "Is this an issue?"
sentences.chinese: 卷子上寫着一行字，“這是一個問題嗎？”

sentences.english: The teachers are grading the papers.
sentences.chinese: 老師們正在給卷子打分數。

sentences.english: The teacher told students on no account to peep at other’s papers during the test.
sentences.chinese: 老師告訴學生在考試中絕對不要偷看別人的卷子。

sentences.english: Not until recently has the teacher found the hidden papers.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近老師才找到被藏起的卷子。

sentences.english: After the supervisor declared the start of the test, all the students got right down to writing.
sentences.chinese: 監考老師一聲令下，同學們馬上開始做卷子。

sentences.english: The male student was leaning over to look at the female student’s paper.
sentences.chinese: 男同學俯身看着女同學的卷子。

definition: see 考試卷|考试卷[kao3 shi4 juan4]
to correct student papers/to grade exam papers
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]
to mark (homework, exam scripts etc)/to correct and criticize (an article)/to check/to correct/a correction (to a piece of writing)
